title: Saved by You
description: Can one summer change your life?One fateful night, Maggie’s life unravels before her eyes. While her mother is on her death bed, Maggie discovers a devastating secret kept by the man she loves. And it’s threatening to tear them apart.Now Maggie’s left to pick up the pieces. She’s struggling to be the woman that her mother has raised while juggling the desires of her own heart. Secrets from her past surface — memories long locked away. And her world is rocked when she finds out that her mother has some secrets of her own.Where do you turn when everything you thought you knew was a lie?(New Adult Contemporary) **Mature Content** Recommended for ages 17+ due to sexual situations and language.
author: Kelly Harper
